value.condition: Window.IsActive(SettingsCategory.xml) | Window.IsActive(systeminfo) | Window.IsActive(skinsettings) | Window.IsActive(settings) | Window.IsActive(addonbrowser) | Window.IsActive(filemanager)

variable.name: SkinSettingsDescriptionVar
variable.value: This will open the sidemenu when navigating to the top left corener of the screen when available. This is a test setting for those that use a mouse to navigate through Kodi, if anybody likes this setting let me know and I will keep it.
